title: SLPP MPs to meet Justice Minister
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Parliamentary Group of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna will meet Justice Minister Dr. Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe at 10 AM on Thursday (2) in Parliament.
The meeting will be held to discuss the proposed 21st Amendment to the Constitution.
Meanwhile, a meeting between political parties represented in Parliament and the Prime Minister is scheduled to be held on Friday (3) regarding the 21st Amendment to the Constitution.
The meeting will be held at 4.00 PM on Thursday (2) at the Prime Minister’s Office.
